<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Defines name of current scope. Name is visible in debugger, and name is also used as reference in some commands like [[breakOut]] and [[breakTo]]. Scope name should be defined only once per scope. Trying to set a different name on the scope that has already defined scope name will result in error. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''scopeName''' name </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> name: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[scopeName]] "main";
while {true} do {
	[[scopeName]] "loop1";
	while {true} do {
		[[scopeName]] "loop2";
		...
	};
};
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[breakOut]], [[breakTo]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
